Description: Script for ingesting and pre-processing on-line survey data.
Script for savng pre-processed data as MPNet data files.
Script to check that the Everette-Valente brokerage score was properly implemented in R.
Script to  perform Gould and Fernandez (1989) broker role analysis.
Script for exploratory data analysis (including network visualisations).
Script for combining knowledge networks and actor attributes for all three cases and saving as MPNet data files. Useful for cross-case analysis and for model parameterisation.
Script for performing basic text analysis of interview transcripts (term frequency counts, LDA topic modelling, word vector analysis).
